item.title: Karen add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "Forgiveness means it finally becomes unimportant that you hit back. You're done. It doesn't necessarily mean that you want to have lunch with the person. If you keep hitting back, you stay trapped in the nightmare..." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Karen add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "Your problem is how you are going to spend this one and precious life you have been issued. Whether you're going to spend it trying to look good and creating the illusion that you have power over circumstances, or whether you are going to taste it, enjoy it and find out the truth about who you are." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Karen add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "Forgiveness means it finally becomes unimportant that you hit back." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Karen add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "You can either practice being right or practice being kind." -- Anne Lamott
